original_title: Mozart: Sonatas for Violin and Piano
overview: Celebrated Austrian violinist Gottfried Schneider and distinguished German pianist Gerhard Oppitz share the stage for this tour-de-force recital that showcases the work of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart. Together, the duo turns in spirited, virtuoso performances of Mozart's Sonata in F Major, Sonata in B-flat Major and Sonata in E-flat Major.
title: Mozart: Sonatas for Violin and Piano
